resources.string: A drawing of a group of people sitting and talking, made with one continous line
What would you like to do?
A cartoon image of a man holding a cup in one hand and his other hand is on his forehead, in distress
A cartoon image of a hand holding a phone with text message bubbles on it.
A girl sits cross-legged with her hands resting on her knees, in the meditation pose.
A cartoon man is inhaling. Next to this image is the same man, this time exhaling.
